verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764> for the sons <WH1121> of Korach <WH7141>, Maschil <WH4905> <WH8688>. We have heard <WH8085> <WH8804> with our ears <WH241>, O 'Elohim <WH430>, our fathers <WH1> have told <WH5608> <WH8765> us, what work <WH6467> thou didst <WH6466> <WH8804> in their days <WH3117>, in the times <WH3117> of old <WH6924>.

How thou didst drive out <WH3423> <WH8689> the heathen <WH1471> with thy hand <WH3027>, and plantedst <WH5193> <WH8799> them; how thou didst afflict <WH7489> <WH8686> the people <WH3816>, and cast them out <WH7971> <WH8762>.

For they got <WH3423> not the land <WH776> in possession <WH3423> <WH8804> by their own sword <WH2719>, neither did their own arm <WH2220> save <WH3467> <WH8689> them: but thy right hand <WH3225>, and thine arm <WH2220>, and the light <WH216> of thy countenance <WH6440>, because thou hadst a favour <WH7521> <WH8804> unto them.
Thou art my King <WH4428>, O 'Elohim <WH430>: command <WH6680> <WH8761> deliverances <WH3444> for Ya`akov <WH3290>.
Through thee will we push down <WH5055> <WH8762> our enemies <WH6862>: through thy name <WH8034> will we tread them under <WH947> <WH8799> that rise up <WH6965> <WH8801> against us.
For I will not trust <WH982> <WH8799> in my bow <WH7198>, neither shall my sword <WH2719> save <WH3467> <WH8686> me.
But thou hast saved <WH3467> <WH8689> us from our enemies <WH6862>, and hast put them to shame <WH954> <WH8689> that hated <WH8130> <WH8764> us.
In 'Elohim <WH430> we boast <WH1984> <WH8765> all the day <WH3117> long, and praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thy name <WH8034> for ever <WH5769>. Selah <WH5542>.
But <WH637> thou hast cast off <WH2186> <WH8804>, and put us to shame <WH3637> <WH8686>; and goest not forth <WH3318> <WH8799> with our armies <WH6635>.
Thou makest us to turn <WH7725> <WH8686> back <WH268> from the enemy <WH6862>: and they which hate <WH8130> <WH8764> us spoil <WH8154> <WH8804> for themselves.
Thou hast given <WH5414> <WH8799> us like sheep <WH6629> appointed for meat <WH3978>; and hast scattered <WH2219> <WH8765> us among the heathen <WH1471>.
Thou sellest <WH4376> <WH8799> thy people <WH5971> for nought <WH1952>, and dost not increase <WH7235> <WH8765> thy wealth by their price <WH4242>.
Thou makest <WH7760> <WH8799> us a reproach <WH2781> to our neighbours <WH7934>, a scorn <WH3933> and a derision <WH7047> to them that are round about <WH5439> us.
Thou makest <WH7760> <WH8799> us a byword <WH4912> among the heathen <WH1471>, a shaking <WH4493> of the head <WH7218> among the people <WH3816>.
My confusion <WH3639> is continually <WH3117> before me, and the shame <WH1322> of my face <WH6440> hath covered <WH3680> <WH8765> me,
For the voice <WH6963> of him that reproacheth <WH2778> <WH8764> and blasphemeth <WH1442> <WH8764>; by reason <WH6440> of the enemy <WH341> <WH8802> and avenger <WH5358> <WH8693>.
All this is come <WH935> <WH8804> upon us; yet have we not forgotten <WH7911> <WH8804> thee, neither have we dealt falsely <WH8266> <WH8765> in thy covenant <WH1285>.
Our heart <WH3820> is not turned <WH5472> <WH8738> back <WH268>, neither have our steps <WH838> declined <WH5186> <WH8799> from thy way <WH734>;
Though thou hast sore broken <WH1794> <WH8765> us in the place <WH4725> of dragons <WH8577>, and covered <WH3680> <WH8762> us with the shadow of death <WH6757>.
If we have forgotten <WH7911> <WH8804> the name <WH8034> of our 'Elohim <WH430>, or stretched out <WH6566> <WH8799> our hands <WH3709> to a strange <WH2114> <WH8801> god <WH410>;
Shall not 'Elohim <WH430> search this out <WH2713> <WH8799>? for he knoweth <WH3045> <WH8802> the secrets <WH8587> of the heart <WH3820>.
Yea, for thy sake are we killed <WH2026> <WH8795> all the day <WH3117> long; we are counted <WH2803> <WH8738> as sheep <WH6629> for the slaughter <WH2878>.
Awake <WH5782> <WH8798>, why sleepest <WH3462> <WH8799> thou, O YY <WH136>? arise <WH6974> <WH8685>, cast us not off <WH2186> <WH8799> for ever <WH5331>.
Wherefore hidest <WH5641> <WH8686> thou thy face <WH6440>, and forgettest <WH7911> <WH8799> our affliction <WH6040> and our oppression <WH3906> ?
For our soul <WH5315> is bowed down <WH7743> <WH8804> to the dust <WH6083>: our belly <WH990> cleaveth <WH1692> <WH8804> unto the earth <WH776>.
Arise <WH6965> <WH8798> for our help <WH5833>, and redeem <WH6299> <WH8798> us for thy mercies <WH2617> ' sake.
